forge
Class AllZoneUtil

java.lang.Object
  forge.AllZoneUtil

public class AllZoneUtil
extends Object

AllZoneUtil contains static functions used to get CardLists of various cards in various zones.

Version:
$Id: $
Author:
dennis.r.friedrichsen (slapshot5 on slightlymagic.net)

getCardsInGame

public static CardList getCardsInGame()
a CardListFilter to get all cards that are a part of this game

Returns:
a CardList with all cards in all Battlefields, Hands, Graveyards, Libraries, and Exiles.
